about_the_game:
The guys that brought you podcasts such as "Brandons Discuss Anime" and "Movie Makers" bring their unique vision to life in this debut game.

Get ready for an unique game where you enter a world, where the undead have invaded the city and are wreaking havoc. This isn't your normal zombie game by a long shot!

Your mission is to become the brave warrior that will face these vicious monsters, and track down the sorcerer that summoned this plague of terror. How will you do this? With your powerful fists of course! In this fun and exciting game, inspired by 6th gen platformers, you will have to run, jump, and punch your way through over 20 creepy environments.

Do you have what is needed to release the hero within yourself? Dare to immerse yourself in this world full of action and discover the hero you carry
inside! Play "Punch The Undead" and get ready for a fun and exciting gaming experience. The fight against the Undead begins here!
